import React, { useState } from "react"; import './BadgeEditForm.css' const BadgeEditForm = () => { const [selectedSport, setSelectedSport] = useState() const handleSportSelection = (e) => { setSelectedSport(e.target.innerText) } return (

) } export default BadgeEditForm;
